newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Swedish Riksbank board meeting ends, no changes.
newsitem.headline: Swedish Riksbank board meeting ends, no changes.

text.p: Sweden's central bank, the Riksbank, ended a board meeting on Thursday with no interest rate changes announced.
The bank's board will meet next on March 6 at 0745 GMT.
Currently, the Riksbank's key interest rate, the repo rate, stands at 4.10 percent.
Other key rates, the deposit and lending rates, that mark out the Riksbank's interest rate corridor, stand at 3.75 percent and 5.25 percent, respectively.
